text:
Hi everyone, I am working on the CMS for Developers Practicum and I am stuck at this stage:
• I have installed Node.js
• I installed Visual Studio Code
• When I entered this line on the Terminal: "npm install -g @HubSpot/cli", I received this Error screen: 
I am following the HubSpot documentation, watching YouTube videos, and researching how to solve for this to complete the exercise.

Can anyone help identify why there is an error when I try to install this code? Thank you.

Hey Tracy, I’d try the following:

1. Use “sudo” before the original command, just in case it's a permissions issue
2. Try using NVM instead of NPM. NVM is localized to the folder and may play nicer with your OS
Thank you for your assistance, Mark! I was able to successfully install the code by using sudo before. Crossing my fingers that the assignment passes the grade!
